channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: On a testé le nouveau VanMoof : le retour en grâce du vélo électrique connecté longtemps tombé en disgrâce
item.description: Après un modèle S5 fiabilisé, le VanMoof S6 peaufine le style et la technologie d’un vélo électrique qui ne déçoit sur aucun point, que ce soit la connectivité ou la conduite à boîte automatique. Nous l'avons testé, voici notre verdict.

item.title: The endearing movie that affirms creativity as a human act
item.description: Peter Hujar's Day began, as many great works of art do, with a DM. Director Ira Sachs (Passages, The Delta) had just finished reading a recently unearthed interview between the late portrait photographer Peter Hujar and writer Linda Rosenkrantz that took place in 1974. That dialogue - a conversation about creative anxieties, complete with the […]

item.title: Soaring electricity rates fueled Democratic victories — now comes the hard part
item.description: While there's plenty for voters to be worried about right now, rising utility bills have become a hot-button issue. The success of Democrats in New Jersey, Virginia, and Georgia in this week's elections can be seen as something of a referendum on the state of energy policy and infrastructure in the US as power grids […]

item.title: How to watch Italy vs Australia: free streams, TV channels and team news for 2025 Autumn Internationals rugby game
item.description: All the ways to watch Italy vs Australia live streams online, with Louis Lynagh set for a starring role in the 2025 Autumn International at Stadio Friuli.

item.title: The WhatsApp team is aware that the new Apple Watch app is crashing on certain models – and is 'working quickly' to fix it
item.description: WhatsApp has arrived on the Apple Watch, but some users are unable to get it running properly.

item.title: Garmin Forerunner 255 : cette excellente montre connectée chute enfin sous les 200 € en ce pré-Black Friday
item.description: Testée et largement validée par nos soins, la Garmin Forerunner 255 est l'alliée des sportifs, en particulier des coureurs grâce à ses données très précises. Pendant le pré-Black Friday, cette montre connectée bien équipée est proposée à 199,99 euros au lieu de 349,99 euros chez Decathlon.

item.title: Trump’s Hatred of EVs Is Making Gas Cars More Expensive
item.description: Trump’s anti-climate agenda is making it more expensive to own a car, period.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Fairphone Lands in the US, and WhatsApp Is Finally on the Apple Watch
item.description: Plus: Motorola has new Moto G phones, Canon’s R6 III mirrorless has a 32-MP sensor, and Teenage Engineering’s Riddim n’ Ting looks gorgeous.

item.title: The 42 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Frankenstein, The Twits, and The Running Man are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The 42 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (November 2025)
item.description: The Witcher, Boots, and House of Guinness are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: I tested the Hisense U75QG mini-LED TV, and it’s the best value Hisense TV
item.description: The Hisense U75QG delivers a super-bright picture and great gaming features at an affordable price. It may just be the company's best-value mini-LED TV yet.

item.title: How to watch Scotland vs New Zealand: live stream Autumn Internationals 2025 rugby from anywhere, TV channel, preview, team news
item.description: Murrayfield seeks a first win over the All Blacks in 120 years? Here's how to can watch Scotland vs New Zealand live streams from wherever you are in the world.

item.title: How failure taught me to succeed as an entrepreneur
item.description: A leader in the fashion footwear business shares the secrets of his success. Over the past 50 years in the shoe trade, I have had my fair share of failure.

item.title: Don’t wait for Black Friday – this colour laser printer from Brother is the cheapest you can buy, with an extra £35 off the price right now
item.description: Black Friday savings start now! Brother's HL-L3220CWE is the cheapest colour laser printer in the UK.

item.title: Unpicking How to Measure the Complexity of Knots
item.description: Two mathematicians have proved that a straightforward question—how hard is it to untie a knot?—has a complicated answer.

item.title: Should You Cold Plunge Before or After a Workout? (2025)
item.description: If you’re going to suffer, make sure it’s worth the effort. We consulted fitness experts to help you maximize your ice bath.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 11 offres à saisir
item.description: Le coup d’envoi du pré-Black Friday a été donné chez de nombreux e-commerçants, et Xiaomi ne compte pas manquer l’événement. La marque chinoise multiplie les offres et casse les prix sur l’ensemble de ses produits phares. Découvrez ceux qui ont retenu notre attention.
